\subsection*{Maturity Ladder}
\begin{longtable}{p{0.18\textwidth}p{0.12\textwidth}p{0.62\textwidth}}
\toprule
\textbf{Stage} & \textbf{Governance Integration Index} & \textbf{Description and Checkpoints} \ 
\midrule
Emergent & 0.25 & Core custodial roles appointed, baseline AEIP evidence established, and escalation paths rehearsed on paper.\newline\begin{itemize}
\item [E1] Charter ratification recorded with quorum proof\newline\textit{AEIP: schemas/aeip/civic-charter-schema.json; Evidence: civic\_mandate.ratification.vote\_tally}
\item [E2] Incident lifecycle drill executed within 90 days\newline\textit{AEIP: schemas/aeip/incident-report-schema.json; Evidence: timeline.verification\_complete\_at}
\end{itemize} \ 
\midrule
Structured & 0.5 & Layer controls operationalised with automation, transparency tiers activated, and AEIP manifests cross-linked to dashboards.\newline\begin{itemize}
\item [S1] Control tables generated for Layers 0–8 with evidence references\newline\textit{AEIP: schemas/aeip/manifest.yaml; Evidence: control\_tables.last\_generated\_at}
\item [S2] Governance publications released within statutory windows\newline\textit{AEIP: schemas/governance-decision-summary.jsonld; Evidence: publication.window\_days}
\end{itemize} \ 
\midrule
Integrated & 0.75 & Cross-jurisdictional reciprocity established, provenance signatures federated, and participation cycles co-managed with residents.\newline\begin{itemize}
\item [I1] Custodial signatures verified across two jurisdictions\newline\textit{AEIP: schemas/aeip/aeip-frame-schema.json; Evidence: signatures[].witness\_chain}
\item [I2] Participation response memos published within 30 days\newline\textit{AEIP: schemas/aeip/tecl-schema.json; Evidence: influence\_statements[].response\_published\_on}
\end{itemize} \ 
\midrule
Institutionalized & 1.0 & Stack obligations embedded in law, budgeted, independently audited, and continuously certified via AEIP attestations.\newline\begin{itemize}
\item [N1] Statutory adoption enacted with budget line items\newline\textit{AEIP: schemas/aeip/civic-charter-schema.json; Evidence: mandate.statute\_reference}
\item [N2] Annual independent audit attested and published\newline\textit{AEIP: schemas/oversight-audit-memo.jsonld; Evidence: attestation\_bundle.hash}
\end{itemize} \ 
\bottomrule
\end{longtable}
\subsection*{Governance Transport Grid}
\begin{longtable}{p{0.2\textwidth}p{0.18\textwidth}p{0.18\textwidth}p{0.18\textwidth}p{0.18\textwidth}}
\toprule
\textbf{Layer} & \textbf{Emergent} & \textbf{Structured} & \textbf{Integrated} & \textbf{Institutionalized} \ 
\midrule
Layer 0 Civic Mandate & Mandate ratified, escalation contacts logged & Renewal cadence codified, breach portal live & Reciprocal recognition across partner jurisdictions & Mandate embedded in statute with oversight budget \ 
\midrule
Layer 1 Ethical Charter & Values enumerated with named custodians & Change log automated and published & Cross-institution harmonisation signed & Charter recognised in collective bargaining and law \ 
\midrule
Layer 2 Data Stewardship & Data inventory completed with lawful basis & Incident drills performed and logged & Cross-border transfer controls verified & Stewardship obligations audited annually \ 
\midrule
Layer 3 Model Development & Model card templates adopted & Evaluation evidence published per release & External review seats embedded & Certification required before deployment \ 
\midrule
Layer 4 Instruction and Control & Instruction sessions logged & Anomaly alerts routed to oversight & Cross-layer overrides negotiated & Command policy codified in regulation \ 
\midrule
Layer 5 Reasoning Exchange & Transcript capture enabled & Semantic reconciliation tracked & Community deliberation loops funded & Legally mandated dialogue archives \ 
\midrule
Layer 6 Deployment and Integration & Deployment checklist completed & Rollback readiness rehearsed & Shared service continuity compacts & Deployment gating tied to licensing \ 
\midrule
Layer 7 Governance Publication & Public notice channel launched & Tiered transparency schedules active & Cross-platform syndication agreements & Publication SLAs codified in law \ 
\midrule
Layer 8 Civic Participation & Participation roster registered & Feedback responses published & Co-governance councils empowered & Participation rights protected in charter \ 
\bottomrule
\end{longtable}
